item.title: Consider note-taking, you won't regret
item.description: TL;DR: keep track of your thoughts and ideas. In our lives, we consume tons of information, have heaps of various experiences and, generally, learn a lot. We read books, watch videos, attend lectures, listen to podcasts, etc. In other words, we consume the ideas and thoughts of other people. Mine vs others' However, sometimes, we make our own discoveries. It could happen during a conversation with your colleague about a book we’re reading.
